text: Daniel is a 1983 British American spy drama movie directed by Sidney Lumet and was based on the 1971 novel The Book of Daniel by E. L. Doctorow. It stars Timothy Hutton, Mandy Patinkin, Lindsay Crouse, Ellen Barkin, Amanda Plummer, Daniel Stern, Ed Asher, Maria Tucci, Peter Copley and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1983 drama movies Category:1980s spy movies Category:1980s British drama movies Category:British spy movies Category:1980s American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Sidney Lumet Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies about capital punishment Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in Washington, D.C. title: Daniel (1983 movie)
